body: If your kingdom has surplus production from farms and fisheries that reduces its Consumption to below 0, you may export food. A successful food trade route increases Economy by 1 for every 10 Farms and Fisheries in the kingdom; this benefit is lost in any month that Farms and Fisheries do not reduce Consumption below 0. You must have at least 1 Granary and 1 Stockyard in your settlement.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Kingdoms And War/Optional Kingdom Rules/Trade Edicts/Food
name: Food
